title.en: Himitsu no Yubisaki - Katakoi Doukei Tanpenshuu 2

altTitles.ja: 秘密のゆびさき-片恋憧憬短編集2-

description.en:
The second volume of Soyoko Inogari's highly acclaimed early short stories!


Yura is a girl in her third year of high school. She secretly has a crush on Maya, who is in the same class with her, but when her parents remarry, she and Maya suddenly become sister and brother in law...!
(Published in the August 1, 2011 issue of Hanato Yume)

How to Start a Natsukare:
Yuki is on her first summer vacation as a university student. While all her friends are getting boyfriends, she's worried that nothing is happening to her. One day, a childhood friend, Chihiro, suggests, "Shall I pretend to be your boyfriend?
(Published in the September 1, 2014 issue of Hanato Yume)

Red Lantern Moon:
Rentaro has a crush on Benihime, a senior who loves books more than anything else. However, it is Rentaro's older brother, Mr. Noyo, who has a crush on Benihime. As their unfulfilled love grows, the last cultural festival for both of them is approaching--!
(Published in the October 1, 2010 issue of "The Flower and Yume")

Koibitoasobi:
Saki and Moe are twin sisters. Saki has a crush on Kiriyori, who has feelings for Moe, but when Moe starts dating Kiriyori's best friend, Saki asks Kiriyori to pretend to be his girlfriend, saying "I'll take Moe's place.
(Published in the February 1, 2010 issue of "The Flower and Yume")

Haru wo ki wo kiisasete...:
Hinako is a junior high school student preparing for the high school entrance exam. She dreams of a new life, but her grades are so bad that she is in danger of staying in school. At that time, Usami, a first-year junior high school student who is renowned as a "genius," becomes Hinako's personal teacher--!
(Published in the April 1, 2010 issue of "The Flower and Yume")
